com.philips.platform.appinfra

Class AppInfra

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.philips.platform.appinfra.AppInfra
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AppInfraInterface, ComponentVersionInfo, java.io.Serializable

    public class AppInfra
extends java.lang.Object
implements AppInfraInterface, ComponentVersionInfo, java.io.Serializable
    The AppInfra Base class, here using builder design pattern to create object .
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AppInfra.Builder
      The type Builder,to enable an application developer to create his own implementation for specific App Infra modules and have all components integrated in the app use that alternative module implementation; App Infra supports a builder pattern.
